blackbeard:Ssssserpent.NAME: The Ssssserpent
DESCRIPTIONS: "Ho, ho, hooo! NL NL I appreciate your enthusiasm. NL NL Gold and treasuresssss. Gold and treasuresssss. NL ~GOLD~ ~AND~ ~TREASURESSSSS.~ NL NL ~Take~ ~thissssss!~ @*TAKE*@ @*THISSSSSS*!"@
OPTIONS: #gGold. #gGain #ga #gRelic. You have no doubt in your mind.

blackbeard:Vampires.NAME: Vampires(?)
DESCRIPTIONS: "Oh, so you are interested in the weaponry enchanted with our ~POWER?~ NL NL Very well, for the money you are offering I can give you this #y~Vampiric~ #y~Scepter.~ NL NL Perhaps next time you will join us, to #rfeed with your own teeth."
